'''''The Middle Earth Album''''' is an album by [[Glass Hammer]], released in 2001.
==Track listing==
*As I Walk
*The King's Beer
*Night and Day (The Tale of Elrenn Walthair and Endereth Tamarel)
*The Man In The Wood
*Sweet Goldberry
*Mirkwood
*Mithrandir
*The Old Troll
*The Old Troll and The Maiden
*Dwarf and Orc (A Tale Of Balin Longbeard)
*No Crown For Balin
*Balin Longbeard
